title: Upgrade Your Lifestyle With This Spacious Luxury Studio
map_address: Queens Blvd near 68th Drive and Yellowstone Boulevard
posting_body: ['Rent: $2,690 / Month', 'Beds: 0', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 07/29/2022', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Welcome to full-service, luxury living at the best address in Forest Hills - Parker Towers!', "It's a touch of Upper East Side in a quiet community at very liveable prices - prices you will not find in Manhattan.", 'SPECIAL OFFERS available for qualified applicants and leases', '- Up to $1,700 in savings with Free Wifi/Cable and added perks on select apartments if you lease by 7/31', '- 1 Year of Free Wifi/Cable', '- Reduced Security Deposits as low as half a month’s rent', 'On a top floor of an elevator building, this ample studio offers sweeping North East city views, classic finishes, modern conveniences and the most coveted amenities.', "Once you join the Parker Towers community, you won't want to leave.", 'Beyond pet-friendly, the Parker Towers Complex even includes a dog run.', "Just a few blocks from the superb, award-winning dining offerings and cute boutiques on Austin Street, as well as a Sunday Farmer's Market, and the Forest Hills Stadium.", 'Takes just minutes to hop on the E,F, M, R Forest Hills Express stop,  for 30 min commute to  Midtown Manhattan.', '15 minutes to both LaGuardia and JFK airports and a 90 min drive to the Hamptons, the Parker Towers is the most convenient address for serial travelers.', 'Behold the Endless Amenities:', '• 24-7 Doorman/Concierge', '• Monitored Package, Grocery and Laundry Delivery Room', '• Elevator building', '• Modern Laundry Facilities in each building', '• Built-in AC and heating in every unit', '• 24/7 Attended garage parking with EV charging stations available', '• 3 Massive Common Outdoor Space', '• 3 Fitness Centers', '• Party Room to reserve for private functions', '• Resident Lounge', '• Community events including weekly yoga, movies on the great lawn, resident get-togethers and more', '• On-site Café', '• Live In Super', '• Storage', '• WiFi', '• Online rental payments', '* Pictures are of a similar unit on the same line.', 'FEATURES', '22nd Floor', 'Classic Finish', 'Common Outdoor Space', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Health Club', 'Laundry', 'Live In Super', 'Northeast Facing', 'Storage', 'WiFi', 'Call, text or email Gesha-Marie 6462397412 to schedule a viewing or virtual tour.']
